query.text: ----- Queries on the robot's logged belief state -----

query.q: owl_individual_of(I, saphari:'HumanIntrusion'), owl_has(I, knowrob:'startTime', T), owl_has(I, knowrob:'designator', D), mng_designator_props(D, 'TF-PREFIX', Prefix), add_stickman_visualization('human1', human1:'iai_human_robot1', T, '', Prefix).
query.text: What was the pose of the Human when intrusion events occurred?
